introduce_product: "From BABY-G, the casual watch for active women, come gorgeous new models for the holiday season.
list_specification_product: 29 time zones (48 cities + coordinated universal time), daylight saving on/off
Measuring modes: Elapsed time, split time, 1st-2nd place times
Countdown start time setting range: 1 minute to 24 hours (1-minute increments and 1-hour increments)
Analog: 2 hands (hour, minute (hand moves every 20 seconds))
Digital: Hour, minute, second, pm, month, date, day
